comments.content:
This is may be a custom designed font -- the NFL tends to spend a little money on this stuff.

Colossalis is in the ballpark (pun intended):

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/colossalis-bq/medium/testdrive.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20120226073838/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/colossalis-bq/medium/testdrive.html "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/colossalis-bq/medium/testdrive.html")

If you stretch [Teknik](http://web.archive.org/web/20120226073838/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=ITC.2735.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=BRADY&sampleSize=48) and customise the A and R you can get pretty close.
